AzureBlade's stoop was abrubtly stopped by perceptor's dig.
AzureBlade: SLAG YOU COWARD!!!!! I'LL DESTROY YOU!!!!! (This 
interrupted attack allowed him to cool off his head) Alright, ally, 
you wanted me to take care of their air support, right? Well here I 
go!

He flew subtly behind Triggerhappy. He aimed with his plasma cannon 
and fired two shots.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> Perceptor felt the missiles come and he thought "It's time to 
> dissappear"
> 
> He trasnformed quickly to his beast mode and he dug a tunnel when 
the 
> missles arrive to the target (Perceptor), just two could hit 
> him 'cause he was underground when the last two arrived.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > :::Sideswipe/Orion:::
> > 
> > ::Sideswipe dodged the shots::
> > Sideswipe: You Decepticons will never win!
> > ::He fires 2 missles and 25 rifle shots at Perceptor::
> > ~~~~~
> > ::Orion got hit by most of the shots, blowing him back.  He ran 
> back up::
